ProductInfo.Features:
This Unlocked cell phone will work on GSM carries like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 mHz frequencies for both SIM Slots plus GPRS/EDGE/WAP data capabilities.
2.6-Inch Capacitive Touchscreen, 320 x 240 pixels; 3.2MP Camera, 2048x1536 pixels with video recorder; Push Mail; Social Apps: Facebook and Twitter; FM Radio; MP3/MP4 Player and Organizer.
QWERTY Keyboard; Bluetooth 2.3; Wi-Fi; 3.5mm Audio Jack; Internal Memory: 1 GB ROM, 256 MB RAM; MicroSD Card slot up to 32GB; Browser: WAP 2.0/xHTML; JAVA and MP3 Ringtones.
Talk time up to 3 hrs 30 min  - Stand-by up to 250 hrs
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Q360 Deco Pro Unlocked Quad-Band Dual SIM Phone with 3.2MP Camera, 2.6-Inch Touchscreen, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth - No Warranty - Pink
